First, I'd like you to answer the question I give you. The theme is just for fun!
If you answer the question, it'll be entered in the baton for everyone else to see!
If you do that, I'd like to you to deliver the baton to the next person! The address will be shown on the baton!
The address will be somewhere nearby in this residential area. Sounds easy, right?
